meanings.definition: A long, slender pin used to secure a hat to the hair.
meanings.sent1: She carefully inserted the hatpins into her bun to keep her hat in place.
meanings.sent2: The vintage hat was held securely by the delicate hatpins.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the hatpins for acorns and tried to bury them.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like hatpins, always keeping things in place no matter the challenge.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming hatpins shimmered in the sunlight, adding a touch of elegance to her outfit.

meanings.definition: A decorative pin used to hold a hat in place.
meanings.sent1: The jeweled hatpins added a touch of glamour to her outfit.
meanings.sent2: She carefully selected the perfect hatpins to match her hat.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten batted at the hatpins, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like hatpins, brightening up the room with its charm.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the hatpins made them stand out as a fashion statement.

meanings.definition: A pin with a decorative head used for fastening a hat to the head.
meanings.sent1: The elegant hatpins with pearl heads added a touch of sophistication to her look.
meanings.sent2: She secured her hat with the ornate hatpins before stepping out.
meanings.sent3: The playful breeze danced around her, trying to snatch the hatpins playfully.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as the grip of the hatpins.
meanings.sent5: The hatpins gleamed like tiny jewels, enhancing the beauty of her hat.
